General.Name: Jiangsu Guomao Reducer Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Guomao Reducer Co., Ltd. produces and sells reducers, gearbox, gearmotors, and motors in China. The company's products include AP-palm oil and geared motors; cycloidal, and plastic and rubber special reducers; and industrial, planetary, and PV series gearboxes. It serves steel, rubber and plastic, palm oil, and crane industries. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Changzhou, China.

1.Name: Mr. Yipin  Lu
1.Title: CFO, Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Director
